alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 5:58PM CDT until June 19 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kimble County in west central Texas... Southeastern Menard County in west central Texas... Western Mason County in west central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near London, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... London around 615 PM CDT. Saline around 620 PM CDT. Long Mountain around 640 PM CDT. Streeter and Grit around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Highway 29 And Ranch Road 1222, The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 1773, Erna, Us-377 Near The Kimble- Menard County Line and Us-83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
